name: Turnip Boy Commits Tax Evasion
summary: Play as an adorable yet trouble-making turnip. Avoid paying taxes, solve plantastic puzzles, harvest crops and take on massive beasts all in a journey to tear down a corrupt vegetable government!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: AAVG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2021年4月22日
  • 官方网站: http://playturnipboy.com/
  • 开发: Snoozy Kazoo
  • 发行: Graffiti Games
